exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: unfold is_LimSup_seq. intros eps. split. - intros N. exists 0%nat. split. + apply Nat.le_0_l. + unfold Rminus. rewrite Rplus_opp_r. apply eps. - exists 0%nat. intros n _. unfold Rminus. rewrite Rplus_opp_r. apply eps.
